name: tombiovis
description: The FSC Identikit is a framework for creating online  biological identification keys and related resources.  The genesis of the project  was the Field Studies Council's (FSC) Tomorrow's Biodiversity  project (funded by Esm�e Fairbairn 2013-2017 inclusive).  Esm�e Fairbairn funded a further year's development of the  Identikit (covering 2018) to facilitate rolling the work forward into the HLF-funded FSC BioLinks project which runs from 2018 to 2022 inclusive. The Field Studies Council is a UK-based environmental education charity. We are committed to moving FSC Identikit forward  as an open-source collaborative venture.
